casebody.data:
HAMLET H.M.A., LLC
v.
HERNANDEZ 425A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 8, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, for Hernandez, Pedro (M.D.) William S. F. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Rebecca C. Huntington, Attorney at Law, for Hamlet H.M.A., LLC D/B/A Sandhills Regional Medical Center. Linwood Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Healthcare Association. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of May 2019 by Amicus for leave to file State of NC Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of May 2019." Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). Davis, J. recused.
